resources.string: Please select a test scenario.\n In order to test all three scenarios - click the "Reset Tests" button and re-launch the application after each test is completed
Clicking the "Reset Tests" will delete the device cache for this application

Opt-In Example\nUse case: User is prompted for Terms Of Condition / a CDN reply is expected in order to determine if the user should be tracked\nThis example uses a toggle button to allow/disallow tracking
Track And Anonymize Example\nTrack an install and anonymize all subsequent data
Track And Opt-Out Example\nTrack an install and opt-out all subsequent data
